alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Rutherford; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 1:27PM CDT until June 15 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Marshall County in Middle Tennessee... West central Rutherford County in Middle Tennessee... Eastern Williamson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 127 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Franklin, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Franklin, Brentwood, Spring Hill, Thompson`s Station, Eagleville and Triune. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 54 and 69. Interstate 840 between mile markers 26 and 45. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
